name: Message alerte analyses medicales

algorithm:
if not date_de_debut_du_prejudice():
    ajouter_erreur("La date de debut d'arret n'est pas definie")
name: Vérification de la déclaration d'arrêt de travail

custom_views.view_content:
<group id="group_conf" col="2" colspan="2">
<label name="claim"/>
<field name="claim"/>
<label name="start_date"/>
<field name="start_date"/>
<label name="covered_person"/>
<field name="covered_person"/>
<label name="end_date"/>
<field name="end_date"/>
<label name="loss_desc"/>
<field name="loss_desc" widget="selection"/>
<field name="possible_loss_descs" invisible="1"/>
<label name="event_desc"/>
<field name="event_desc" widget="selection"/>
<label name="benefit_to_deliver"/>
<field name="benefit_to_deliver" widget="selection"/>


</group>
<newline/>
<field name="benefits" colspan="2"/>
<field name="services" colspan="2"/>

<group id="group_conf" col="2" colspan="2">
<label name="claim"/>
<field name="claim"/>
<label name="start_date"/>
<field name="start_date"/>
<label name="covered_person"/>
<field name="covered_person"/>
<label name="end_date"/>
<field name="end_date"/>
<label name="loss_desc"/>
<field name="loss_desc" widget="selection"/>
<field name="possible_loss_descs" invisible="1"/>
<label name="event_desc"/>
<field name="event_desc" widget="selection"/>
<label name="benefit_to_deliver"/>
<field name="benefit_to_deliver" widget="selection"/>


</group>
<newline/>
<field name="benefits" colspan="2"/>
<field name="services" colspan="2"/>

step_xml:
<group id="eligibility" colspan="4" states="{"invisible":{"__class__": "Not", "v": {"__class__": "Bool", "v": {"d": "", "__class__": "Eval", "v": "delivered_services"}}}}">
<field name="delivered_services" view_ids="claim_eligibility.claim_service_decision_view_list"/>
<field name="is_services_deductible"  invisible="1"/>
</group>
<group id="user_message" colspan="4" states="{"invisible":{"__class__": "Not", "v": {"__class__": "Not", "v": {"__class__": "Bool", "v": {"d": "", "__class__": "Eval", "v": "delivered_services"}}}}}">
<image name="tryton-dialog-warning" xexpand="0" xfill="0" />
<label id="user_warning_message" string="Attention ! Aucune prestation ne peut être délivrée." />
</group>
<newline />
<group id="document" yexpand="1" yfill="1" colspan="4">
<field name="document_request_lines" colspan="4"/>
<field name="doc_received" invisible="1"/>
</group>

<label name="losses_description"/>
<field name="losses_description" colspan="3"/>
<button string="Demandes de documents" name="launch_report_wizard"/>
<field name="document_request_lines" colspan="4"/>
<field name="doc_received" invisible="1"/>
<field name="all_services_refused" invisible="1"/>

<label name="losses_description"/>
<field name="losses_description" colspan="3"/>
<button string="Saisie des salaires" name="launch_salaries_wizard"/>
<field name="delivered_services"  colspan="4" mode="form,tree" view_ids="claim_salary_fr.claim_service_with_salary_view_form" expand_toolbar="0"/>
<field name="delivered_services" invisible="1"/>

<label name="losses_description"/>
<field name="losses_description" colspan="3"/>
<separator  colspan="4" id="delivered_service_separator"/>
<button string="Nouvelle période" name="create_indemnification"/>
<field name="indemnifications_details" colspan="4"/>
<field name="doc_received" invisible="1"/>
<field name="delivered_services" invisible="1"/>

<field name="indemnifications" invisible="1"/>
<field name="has_calculated_indemnification" invisible="1"/>
<field name="delivered_services" invisible="1"/>
<newline/>
<label name="losses_description"/>
<field name="losses_description" colspan="3"/>
  <notebook>
    <page string="Losses" id="losses">
      <field name="indemnifications_to_schedule" colspan="4"/>
    </page>
    <page string="Documents" id="documents">
      <field name="attachments" colspan="4"/>
    </page>
  </notebook>
<!--
<field name="indemnifications" colspan="4" mode="form,tree" expand_toolbar="0" />-->
<field name="is_pending_indemnification"/>
<field name="all_services_refused" invisible="1"/>
<label string="Le sinistre reste ouvert" id="snapshot" yalign="0.0" xalign="0.0" xexpand="1"/>

xml_header:
<label name="name"/>
<field name="name"/>
<label name="status"/>
<group id="status">
<field name="status"/>
<label name="sub_status"/>
<field name="sub_status"/>
</group>
<label name="claimant"/>
<field name="claimant" readonly="1"/>
<label name="legal_entity"/>
<field name="legal_entity" readonly="1"/>
<label name="declaration_date"/>
<field name="declaration_date"/>
<label name="interlocutor"/>
<field name="interlocutor"/>
